verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O Lord O Lord
Release Your pow'r
And let Your presence fall

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord we proclaim You now
Of Your mighty pow'r
And Your awesome majesty
Lord come upon us now
And release Your pow'r
And let Your presence fall
